author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Appaloosa Raises Share Stake In Bank Of America
text:
Feb 14 (Reuters) - Appaloosa LP:
* APPALOOSA RAISES SHARE STAKE IN BANK OF AMERICA TO 17.2 MILLION SHARES FROM 6.3 MILLION SHARES - SEC FILING‍​
* CHANGE IN HOLDINGS ARE AS OF DEC 31, 2017 AND COMPARED WITH THE PREVIOUS QUARTER ENDED AS OF SEPT 30, 2017‍​ Source text for quarter ended Dec 31, 2017: ( bit.ly/2CmrRSi ) Source text for quarter ended Sept 30, 2017 ( bit.ly/2zJRjl2 )
